articles.description: Growing geriatric population and increasing cases of bone fractures is expected to drive growth of the global orthopedic bone cement and casting materials market during the forecast period. Growing geriatric population and increasing cases of bone fractures i…
articles.content: NEWARK, Del, Nov. 13, 2023 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- The orthopaedic bone cement and casting material market is predicted to be valued at US$ 2,920.00 million in 2023 and US$ 4,911.50 million by 2033. Over… [+9802 chars]
